title: Summoner of Miracles - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Beast Companions   Bloodlines   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Dense Protagonist   Fanfiction   Goddesses   Gods   Heroes   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Multiple Realms   Parody   Romantic Subplot   Special Abilities   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Time Travel   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Ruqing Rusu   如倾如诉
description:
Talented in magic but useless in physical combat?

Can summon 10,000 servants, but can he defend the rear by himself?

I will say just one line in reply:

“That will not be a problem!”

This is the tale of a young man who obtained an enshrined miracle.

“As long as I have my servant, I am undefeatable!”>
